close close doCreate doDelete doDelete doRead doRead doUpdate getFunction Implements retrieving a value for the given key(s)/filter has hasFunction jsonDB JsonFileDB JsonFolderDB newCrud processFilter runFilter save save saveFunction

close

Cleans up after the CRUD instance. Should be called just before the instance is deleted

Returns

Promise :

A Promise that resolves when the instance is closed

close

Cleans up after the CRUD instance. Should be called just before the instance is deleted

Returns

Promise :

A Promise that resolves when the instance is closed

doCreate(data)

Inserts data into the JSON database.

Parameters

  • Array or Object data :

    Either an object of key-value pairs, an array containing key/value pairs ([key, value,...]) or, if the key field has been specified, an array of object values each with the key field set

Returns

Promise :

A promise that will resolve with an array containing keys or errors in creating the data of the inserted data.

doDelete(filter)

Delete a value/values from the JSON database

Parameters

  • Key or Array<Key> or Object or true filter :

    Filter to use to find values to retrieve. If true, all will be deleted

Returns

Array<Key> :

An array containing the keys of the deleted data.

doDelete(filter)

Retrieves a value from the JSON database

Parameters

  • Key or Array<Key> or Object or true filter :

    Filter to use to find values to retrieve. If true, all will be deleted

Returns

Array<Key> :

An array containing the keys of the deleted data.

doRead([filter], [expectSingle])

Implements retrieving a value for the given key

Parameters

  • [Key or Array<Key> or Object] filter :

    Filter to use to find values to retrieve

  • [Boolean] expectSingle :

    If true, the single value will be returned as only the value (as opposed to the normal key/value Object. If a single value is not going to be returned, the Promise will reject with an error.

Returns

Promise :

A promise that will resolve to the value(s) for the given key(s)/filter(s).

doRead([filter], [expectSingle])

Implements retrieving a value for the given key

Parameters

  • [Key or Array<Key> or Object] filter :

    Filter to use to find values to retrieve

  • [Boolean] expectSingle :

    If true, the single value will be returned as only the value (as opposed to the normal key/value Object. If a single value is not going to be returned, the Promise will reject with an error.

Returns

Promise :

A promise that will resolve to the value(s) for the given key(s)/filter(s).

doUpdate(data, [filter])

Updates data in the JSON database. Data can either be given as key-value parameter pairs, OR if the key field has been specified Object values. New values will be merge into any existing values.

Parameters

  • Object or Array<Object> or Array data :

    Either:

    • an array of key-value pairs,
    • an object containing the data to update
    • object value(s) containing the key value (if a key has been specified)
  • [Object or true] filter :

    If a object containing the data to update, a filter to select the items that should be updated, or if object value(s) have been given, true if the existing items should be replaced instead of merged into

Returns

Promise :

A promise that will resolve with an array containing keys of the updated data.

getFunction Implements retrieving a value for the given key(s)/filter(filter, [expectSingle])

Parameters

  • Key or Array<Key> or Object filter :

    Filter to use to find values to retrieve

  • [Boolean] expectSingle :

    If true, the single value will be returned as only the value (as opposed to the normal key/value Object. If a single value is not going to be returned, the Promise will reject with an error.

Returns

Promise :

A promise that will resolve to the value(s) for the given key(s)/filter(s).

has(key)

Implements checking for if a value for a key exists

Parameters

  • Key key :

    Key to see if there is a value for

Returns

Promise :

A promise that will resolve to a Boolean value of whether or not a value for the given key exists

hasFunction(key)

Parameters

  • Key key :

    Key to see if there is a value for

Returns

Promise :

A promise that will resolve to a Boolean value of whether or not a value for the given key exists

jsonDB([file], [options])

Generator function for creating a JSON DB. The database is equivalent to a a single table or collection. The generator returns a promise that will resolve to the JSON databaes if everything is ok.

Parameters

  • [String] file :

    Path to file/folder to contain the JSON database

  • [Object] options :

    Object containing the options for the database.

    • [String] options.path

      Path to file/folder to contain JSON database if not given as first argument

    • [String] options.id

      Field of data objects to be used as the key

    • [Boolean] options.cacheKeys

      Cache the keys of the objects in the database

    • [Boolean] options.cacheValues

      Cache the objects in the database

Returns

Promise<JsonDBInstance> :

A promise that will resolve to a JsonDB instance if everything checks out

JsonFileDB(file, options)

Creates a JSON file database instance

Parameters

  • String file :

    Filename of the database

  • Object options :

    Options for the file database

JsonFolderDB(file, options)

Creates a JSON folder database instance

Parameters

  • String file :

    Folder for the database

  • Object options :

    Options for the folder database

newCrud(save, doRead, getKeys, doDelete, close, [options])

Generates a new CRUD instance.

Parameters

  • saveFunction save :

    Function used to save the given data

  • doReadFunction doRead :

    Function used to get data

  • getKeysFunction getKeys :

    Function to be used to retrieve a list of keys currently in the database

  • getFunction doDelete :

    Function used to delete data

  • Function close :

    Function to close and clean up the CRUD instance

  • [Object] options :

    Options to be used in the CRUD operations

Returns

Object :

The new CRUD instance

processFilter(data, filter, callback)

Processes the data against the given filter and runs the given callback against each item that matches

Parameters

  • Object data :

    Data to process against filter

  • Object filter :

    Filter to filter data with

  • Function callback :

    Function to run against matching data

Returns

Promise :

A promise that will resolve when the filtering and callbacks are complete.

runFilter(data, filter)

Checks if the given data hits on the given filter

Parameters

  • Any data :

    Data to check against filter

  • Object filter :

    Filter to check the data against

Returns

Boolean :

Whether the data matches the filter or not.

save(saveArgs)

Saves the data back to the file

Parameters

  • Object saveArgs :

    Data for saving

    • [Boolean] saveArgs.replace

      Whether data should be replaced. If true, data should be replaced, if false an error should thrown / the promise rejected. If undefined, data should be merged/replaced

    • Boolean saveArgs.keys

      Whether or not data is in key/value pairs

    • Array or Object saveArgs.data

      Data to be saved

Returns

Promise :

A promise that will resolve to an array of the keys or errors of the data saved

save(saveArgs)

Saves the data back to the file

Parameters

  • Object saveArgs :

    Data for saving

    • [Boolean] saveArgs.replace

      Whether data should be replaced. If true, data should be replaced, if false an error should thrown / the promise rejected. If undefined, data should be merged/replaced

    • Boolean saveArgs.keys

      Whether or not data is in key/value pairs

    • Array or Object saveArgs.data

      Data to be saved

Returns

Promise :

A promise that will resolve to an array of the keys or errors of the data saved

saveFunction(data)

Parameters

  • Object data :
    • [Boolean] data.replace

      Whether data should be replaced. If true, data should be replaced, if false an error should thrown / the promise rejected. If undefined, data should be merged/replaced

    • Boolean data.keys

      Whether or not data is in key/value pairs

Returns

Promise :

A promise that will resolve to an array of the keys of the data saved
